veninsword.name: Venin Sword
veninsword.desc: Inflicts poison on hit, transforms into a Iron Sword when stolen.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.desc: Effective against armored and cavalry units.

flamesword.name: Flame Sword
flamesword.desc: Casts Fire from 2 range. Grants Magic +5.

thundersword.name: Thunder Sword
thundersword.desc: Casts Thunder from 2 range. Grants Skill +5.

windsword.name: Wind Sword
windsword.desc: Casts Wind from 2 range, but without effective bonus against flying units. Grants Speed +5.

lightbrand.name: Light Brand
lightbrand.desc: Leif only. Casts Lightning from 2 range. Grants Luck +10 and can be used as a item to recover all HP.

earthsword.name: Earth Sword
earthsword.desc: Nanna only. Casts Nosferatu from 2 range. Restores HP equal to damage done to enemy.

shadowsword.name: Shadow Sword
shadowsword.desc: Mareeta only. Strikes twice and grants <:jugdral_nihil:667782733812203520>Nihil.

mareetassword.name: Mareeta's Sword
mareetassword.desc: Mareeta only. Strikes twice and grants <:jugdral_nihil:667782733812203520>Nihil.

beoblade.name: Beo Blade
beoblade.desc: Diarmuid and Fergus only. Grants <:jugdral_vantage:667782734013530112>Vantage and <:jugdral_wrath:667781266497732616>Wrath.

blessedsword.name: Blessed Sword
blessedsword.desc: Olwen only. Strikes twice, effective against cavalry units, grants Magic +10 and <:jugdral_miracle:667782735175221248>Miracle.

bragisblade.name: Bragi's Blade
bragisblade.desc: Leif, Nanna, Diarmuid and Fergus only. Effective against armored units, negates the effect of the Loptrian Fang and grants <:jugdral_miracle:667782735175221248>Miracle.

loptrianfang.name: Loptrian Fang
loptrianfang.desc: Halves enemy's attack power, grants Magic +20.

veninlance.name: Venin Lance
veninlance.desc: Inflicts poison on hit, transforms into a Iron Lance when stolen.

dragonpike.name: Dragonpike
dragonpike.desc: Dean only. Strikes twice and grants <:jugdral_vantage:667782734013530112>Vantage.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: Finn only. Strikes twice and grants Luck +10.

veninaxe.name: Venin Axe
veninaxe.desc: Inflicts poison on hit, transforms into a Iron Axe when stolen.

veninbow.name: Venin Bow
veninbow.desc: Inflicts poison on hit, trasnforms into a Iron Bow when stolen.

veninarch.name: Venin Arch
veninarch.desc: Venin Arch (class) only. Inflicts poison on hit, transforms into a Long Arch when stolen.

direthunder.name: Dire Thunder
direthunder.desc: Olwen and Reinhardt only. Strikes twice.

grafcalibur.name: Grafcalibur
grafcalibur.desc: Asbel only. Effective against flying units.

forseti.name: Forseti
forseti.desc: Ced only. Effective against flying units. Grants Skill +20 and Speed +20.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Restores HP equal to damage done to enemy.

jormungandr.name: Jörmungandr
jormungandr.desc: If being used by an enemy, inflicts poison on hit.

poison.name: Poison
poison.desc: Inflicts poison on hit. Transforms into Fenrir if stolen.

petrify.name: Petrify
petrify.desc: Inflicts Stone on hit. Transforms into Fenrir if stolen.

hel.name: Hel
hel.desc: Enemy only. Brings HP down to 1, cannot kill at 1 HP.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Increases sight in fog of war to a radius of 10 squares (effect lowers each turn).

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Recovers all of an ally's HP.

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc: Removes status conditions (except stone) from an ally.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Increase an ally's magic by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc: Inflicts sleep, doesn't work on enemies on thrones or gates.

watch.name: Watch
watch.desc: Can be used to uncover the roof in Chapter 4 and Endgame.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores the HP of all allies. HP = [Mag + 10]

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Brings an ally next to the user.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Prevents an enemy from using magic, doesn't work on enemies on thrones or gates.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: Inflicts Berserk, doesn't work on enemies on thrones or gates.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Lets an ally escape the map.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Safie only. Repairs an ally's weapon or staff.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: Tina only. Steals an enemy's item.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc: Tina only. Opens a door or chest.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Increase magic by 7 (effect lowers each turn).

sdrink.name: S Drink
sdrink.desc: Sets fatigue to 0 if a character holds it during preparations.

knightproof.name: Knight Proof
knightproof.desc: Promotes a level 10 or higher unit. (Doesn't work on Leif or Linoan)

membercard.name: Member Card
membercard.desc: Allows access to the secret shop.

baldrscroll.name: Baldr Scroll
baldrscroll.desc: <:scroll_baldr:695055243859460208> 5% Hp Growth, 5% Str Growth, 5% Skl Growth, 5% Spd Growth, 5% Lck Growth, 5% Def Growth

hezulscroll.name: Hezul Scroll
hezulscroll.desc: <:scroll_hezul:695830244950540300> 30% Hp Growth, 10% Str Growth, -10% Lck Growth

dainnscroll.name: Dáinn Scroll
dainnscroll.desc: <:scroll_dainn:695055244148867082> 5% Str Growth, -10% Spd Growth, 30% Def Growth, 5% Mov Growth

njorunscroll.name: Njörun Scroll
njorunscroll.desc: <:scroll_njorun:705270171035500575> 30% Str Growth, -10% Mag Growth, 10% Spd Growth, -5% Lck Growth, 5% Def Growth

nalscroll.name: Nál Scroll
nalscroll.desc: <:scroll_neir:695055244312444988> 10% Hp Growth, 10% Str Growth, -10% Skl Growth, 10% Def Growth, 10% Con Growth

ullrscroll.name: Ullr Scroll
ullrscroll.desc: <:scroll_ulir:695830245248466985> 10% Skl Growth, 10% Spd Growth, 10% Lck Growth

thrudscroll.name: Thrud Scroll
thrudscroll.desc: <:scroll_thrud:695830245160517702> 5% Hp Growth, 5% Str Growth, 5% Mag Growth, 10% Skl Growth, 5% Lck Growth

fjalarscroll.name: Fjalar Scroll
fjalarscroll.desc: <:scroll_fjalar:695055244366970971> 5% Str Growth, 5% Mag Growth, 10% Skl Growth, 10% Spd Growth

cedscroll.name: Ced Scroll
cedscroll.desc: <:scroll_ced:695055243943215205> -10% Hp Growth, 10% Mag Growth, 30% Spd Growth

blagiscroll.name: Blagi Scroll
blagiscroll.desc: <:scroll_bragi:695055246610661396> -10% Str Growth, 10% Mag Growth, 30% Lck Growth

heimscroll.name: Heim Scroll
heimscroll.desc: <:scroll_heim:695055244517703720> 30% Mag Growth, 10% Lck Growth, -10% Def Growth
